comment: The instructions, specifically for the final project, are all over the place. He states in one document that the grading criteria are one thing, and in another document, it's another. He doesn't respond to emails or communication as swiftly as one would like, but overall, he gives you all the materials you need to pass the class with an A.
Would not recommend Mark Sims solely on the fact that it takes him about 3 days to respond to any emails that you send him for help. Homework is not hard and generally the class is OK.
